system.effect:
Your Pokémon with Spirit gain the following bonuses based on your Focus Rank.
»» Adept: When your Pokémon starts the day with 2 Spirit or more, that Pokémon gains double the base benefits of the Enduring Soul Class for that day. (not the +HP)
»» Expert: Your Pokémon who went under training today, with Spirit, gain 1 Temporary Spirit at the beginning of each Scene that disappears at the end of the Scene if not used. 
»» Master: Each time your Pokémon gain a Status Effect, Injury, take a Critical Hit, or Double-Super Effective Attack each scene. It gains 1 Spirit.
system.name: Shrug Off
